ComicInfo.Title: Chapter II: Strong Temptations - Strategic Movements - the Innocents Beguiled
ComicInfo.Summary:
Deadpool continues slaughtering all your favorite literary characters!
Tom Sawyer slashed in TWAIN! The Little Women's throats MAY get ALL-CUT!
Why read a book when you can watch a book DIE?!?
Note: This cover is a homage to Classics Illustrated.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:19:03. [CVDB388554]
ComicInfo.Characters: Amy March, Beowulf, Beth March, Captain Ahab, Deadpool, Dr. Watson, Dracula, Headless Horseman, Ishmael, Jo March, Mad Thinker, Meg March, Mulan, Natty Bumppo, Sherlock Holmes, Tom Sawyer
ComicInfo.Teams: Brides of Dracula, The Crew of the Pequod
ComicInfo.Locations: Castle Dracula, England, London, Massachusetts, New York State, Pacific Ocean, Romania, Transylvania
